com.siperian.sif.message.metadata

Class MetaDataQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataBase
      • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable

    public class MetaDataQuery
extends MetaDataBase
    Represents properties of a query from the Siperian repository.
    See Also:
    MetaDataQueryGroup, DescribeSiperianObjectRequest, Serialized Form

    API Group: Metadata

      • getQueryGroupUid

        public String getQueryGroupUid()
        Get the UID of the query group parent this query. All queries must belong to a single query group.
        Returns:
        The UID of the query group parent this query.

      • setColumns

        public void setColumns(ArrayList columns)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the columns of the query.
        Parameters:
        columns - The columns of this query.

      • getColumns

        public List getColumns()
        Get the List of columns that belong to the query.
        Returns:
        A List of MetaDataColumnBase objects representing the columns of the query.

      • addColumn

        public void addColumn(MetaDataColumnBase newColumn)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Add a new column to the query's list of columns.
        Parameters:
        newColumn - The MetaDataColumnBase to add as the new column.

      • removeColumn

        public void removeColumn(int index)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Remove a column from the query.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the column to remove.

      • removeColumn

        public void removeColumn(MetaDataColumnBase removeColumn)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Remove a column from the query.
        Parameters:
        removeColumn - The MetaDataColumnBase to remove.

      • getColumn

        Get the column at the specified index.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The MetaDataColumnBase representing to the column at the specified index.
